meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Kristen Senall Edward Ragan Walter Grubbs Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #4013.

td.p: Kristen Senall, a first grade teacher from Buffalo, New York
Edward Ragan, a historian and Ph.D. candidate from Syracuse, New York
Walter Grubbs, a human resources executive from Fair Oaks, California (whose 1-day cash winnings total $18,001)

tr.td: JAPANESE GEOGRAPHY
WHAT'S ON CABLE?
(Alex: You have to name the cable network that features each series we will give you.)
SPIES & SPYING
MILITARY BRATS
WEIGHTS & MEASURES
12-LETTER WORDS

WalterKristen
